home.descricao: Frontend Developer specialized in Vue.js, combining technologies such as Tailwind CSS, Nuxt, Nuxt UI and TypeScript to create modern and responsive interfaces.

sobre.descricao: Graduated in computer networks, specialized in web development in the Vue.js/Nuxt ecosystem, focusing on high performance and Core Web Vitals. Mastery of rendering strategies (SSR, SSG and Late Hydration) to optimize Total Blocking Time (TBT) and interactivity on mobile devices. Expertise in Nuxt UI, Tailwind CSS, TypeScript and state management with Pinia. Developing modern and scalable applications, applying Clean Code and modular design patterns, creating elegant, responsive and high-performance interfaces, developing reusable components and applying engaging animations for dynamic experiences.

templates.subtituloSecao: Professional and fully customizable templates to speed up your development

lista.desc: Complete admin dashboard with Vue.js 3, TypeScript and Tailwind CSS. Perfect for management systems.

experiencia.subtituloSecao: Below is a bit of my professional history in the technology area.

experiencias.desc: Development of responsive web interfaces using Vue.js/Nuxt, Tailwind and Typescript to create reusable components for different devices.
Performing adjustments and improvements in the front-end of corporate systems.
Working with the development/maintenance of Python scripts in containers, and threat monitoring.

lista.desc: Complete landing page for personal trainer portfolio and hiring, showcasing services, plans, responsively, performatively, and professionally.

Fully customizable and reusable online menu project, where routes are created dynamically and automatically from the menu categories. Its optimized structure facilitates customization and maintenance, being an elegant and professional solution for any restaurant or snack bar.

Web platform for global maritime monitoring. It displays real-time data on wave height, temperature and direction, as well as sea level. Connects to the Open-Meteo Marine Weather API for maritime data and the OpenStreetMap Nominatim API for location information and map search.

Web platform for astronomical exploration, acting as a hub for news and educational content. Integrates official NASA information by connecting the APOD API, and offers instant translation into Portuguese by connecting a second API (DeepL).
Front-end of an e-commerce platform for selling marine algae for aquariums

performance.subtituloSecao: Advanced strategies I use to improve page performance, especially on mobile devices.

implementacao.descricao: In templates and client projects, I apply a combination of:

resultado.descricao: Projects with LCP < 2.5s and CLS â‰ˆ 0 on simulated 3G connections, ensuring excellent mobile experience and technical SEO.

index.descricao: These strategies are fundamental to creating fast and responsive web experiences. Each technique addresses a specific aspect of optimization, from intelligent loading to efficient rendering. Combined, they guarantee excellent Core Web Vitals(They are Google metrics that measure performance.) and a superior experience especially on mobile devices.

tecnica1.descricao: Technique that delays hydration of non-critical components until they are needed, significantly reducing Total Blocking Time (TBT) and improving Interactive Time on mobile devices.
pontos: Components below the fold (outside the initial screen)
Modals, tooltips and non-essential UI elements

resultado.descricao: 45ms reduction in TBT and 15% improvement in Speed Index

tecnica2.descricao: Strategic resource loading combining code splitting, strategic preload and predictive loading to optimize each loading phase.
pontos: Preload of critical resources above the fold

glossarioLink.titulo: Need to understand a technical term?
glossarioLink.descricao: Consult the Technical Glossary for simple explanations of all concepts mentioned above.

itens.definition: Delays the execution of component JavaScript until they are visible on screen, reducing initial processing.
Separates the application into chunks that are loaded on demand, instead of all at once.
Automatically eliminates functions and components that are never used in the final project.
Generates HTML on the server before sending it to the browser, improving SEO and first impression.
Measures how much page elements move during loading. Ideal: below 0.1.
Time until the first text or image appears. Good: below 1.8 seconds.
Time to load the largest visible element. Excellent: below 2.5 seconds.
Sum of all periods where the page does not respond to interactions during loading.
Tells the browser to download important resources before they are requested.
Anticipates which resources the user will need based on standard behavior.
